https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zlKna8jw1I6PDRlIO5HVJ4NEm0j.jpg Siva is fascinated by cinema and runs a rundown movie theater. With his theater in financial trouble, he goes to Chennai to meet his childhood friend Madankumar, who is now a film director, and seek his help. Bramman
